title: Announcement, Artists Choose Artists, 1988
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, center, left, running upward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella waxing in the mountains
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across center, crossing diagonally: ARTISTS CHOOSE ARTISTS/ ARTTISTS CHOOSE ARTISTS; across upper left quadrant, running upward, diagonally: SHARON QUE/ RAYMOND WETZEL; across right quadrant, running upward, diagonally: CAROL JACOBSEN/ KATHY CONSTANTINES; across upper left edge, running upward, sideways: JANUARY 8 - FEBRUARY 6 1988; across center, left, running upward, diagonally: ARTISTS CHOOSE ARTISTS/ Carol Jacobsen------Kathy Constantinedes/ Sharon Que----------Raymond Wetzel/ January 8 - February 6, 1988; across right edge, center, running downward, diagonally: Also in the area/ Detroit Artists Market Opening 5-7:30 pm/ "The Market Selects: Al Hinton and Jens Plum"/ January 8 - February 5, 1998; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT FOCUS; across lower left edge, running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon to 6 p.m.; across lower half of sheet, center: Opening Reception: Friday, January 8 6-8:30 pm  
Verso: Imprinted in black across lower left quadrant: GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit Focus/ Detroit Michigan 48226/ 19/ 88/ With the support of/ the National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ Detroit Council for the Arts; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: Across from the Bricktown People Mover Station; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit MI/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for exhibiton at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.  
Recto: Across sheet, center, text giving title repeated twice, crosses diagonally at double "O".  Across left edge, at various angles, text giving location, dates, participating artists, reception and contact information.  Across right edge, at various angles, text giving participating artists and additonal information.  Throughout sheet, abstract shapes resembling draped fabric. 
Verso: Across upper two thirds of sheet, geometric shapes including squares, ovals, lines.  Lower center, image of easel.  Across lower third of sheet, sponsor and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Artists Choose Artists, 1988. Offset lithograph on tan paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-19
